OOC: really when you thing about it  ots didn't have to move there 
mouth speak.....

::Halucigen::
Halucigen also stuck and extremely tired of this silly trap looked 
into the eyes of Cygnar. He began transmitting pictures into his 
mind.  He showed them standing on a platform, then a drip of acid 
falling from halucigen and melting away the floor which was holding 
them. Then a thumb up or a thumb down.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     He stood inside the Trainer ship.  Well it wasn't exacty 
standing.  He 
> just happened to be upright on the floor.  He had no way of 
moving.  He was 
> acctually quite bored.  He needed someone to talk to or fight with 
or 
> something.  He could still breath and his mouth was open but he 
couldn't 
> properly form words.  As a young bot he had practiced the lost art 
of 
> ventriloquy.  He decided to try his hand at it again.  "Is hare any 
way to 
> hurn his off?"  (I figured it out, this can be said easily without 
moving the 
> mouth or tounge.)
